entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as the one who is trying to move Fred's body. He is also mentioned as taking off after Ron and Hermione.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as being pushed ahead by Harry.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is also mentioned as being pushed ahead by Harry.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred's body is described as being seized and hauled out of the way by Harry and Percy.

entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy is mentioned as helping Harry to move Fred's body.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy and Goyle are mentioned as having vanished.

entities.name: goyle
entities.description: Goyle is mentioned as having vanished along with Malfoy.

relationships.description: Harry and Percy moved Fred's body out of the way.
After moving Fred's body, Harry took off after Ron.
Harry also took off after Hermione.
Percy helped Harry to move Fred's body.
